cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.TR. 

The paper deals with the problem of approximating the distance to monotonicity of Boolean functions, which is a fundamental problem in computational complexity theory. The paper uses techniques from property testing and erasure-resilient testing, which are central topics in computer science. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.CC (Computational Complexity), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.TR (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition).
